Lowell.North Chelmsford, Massachusetts:
North Chelmsford is an unincorporated village in Chelmsford Massachusetts, United States. Although North Chelmsford has its own zip code (01863), library, post office, fire station, water district, and local calling area, it is run by the same local town government and shares a school district with Chelmsford.
North Chelmsford is smaller and more densely populated than neighboring Chelmsford.
